releaseNotes: Discord-style Friends List with real-time online status, friend requests, and private direct messaging. Build successful with ZERO errors.
features: Discord-Style Friends List with Online/Offline Status
Send & Receive Friend Requests with Optional Messages
Real-Time Friend Status (Green = Online, Gray = Offline)
Smart Auto-Accept for Mutual Friend Requests
Privacy Protected (DMs Only Visible to Participants)
bugFixes: Fixed UserReport model properties for moderation
Implemented all Cosmos DB friends/requests methods
Fixed DM message filtering and conversation tracking
Added data binding for friends list UI
